title: AI Conversation Started
description: Fired when a user opens an AI chat or assistant session.

conversationId.description: Unique identifier for the conversation session.

assistantId.description: Unique identifier for the AI assistant or bot.

assistantName.description: Human-readable name of the AI assistant.

model.description: The AI model used for the conversation (e.g. gpt-4, claude-3).

provider.description: The AI provider or vendor powering the assistant.

interface.description: The interface through which the conversation was initiated.

context.description: What the user was doing when they started the conversation.
